ruleText: This is a time based test.
The test will be auto submitted after time limit is lapsed.
Use the Submit button to finish the test.
Please note that once a test is submitted, it cannot be resumed.
The time will be displayed on top right updating each second. Time limit for each test vary with the level of test.
There would be two types of questions - Single Choice and Multiple Choice questions.
Single choice questions will have Radio button, while multiple choice questions will have check boxes.
User can navigate to next and previous questions.
Upon submission, user will be prompted for confirmation.
Result can be downloaded after the test submissoin.
